content.p: SoT (Satisfaction of Things) is a research & survey device in FingeRate metaverse that maps the real world. Each SoT is installed at intervals of 300m~500m and comes with a meeting room.
ol: Survey requesters can run a survey on any SoT device they want, and the survey participants will be rewarded for participating in the survey.
Users can participate in surveys through SoTs available at their current location
Survey participants will be rewarded with SoM (SoT mileage) after completing the survey. SoM can be used to upgrade your avatar or purchase various items & services from the Marketplace.

points: Generating revenue from the SoT devices
Earning SoM as rewards for survey participation
More fun and engaging survey experience
Possible to retrieve survey data disaggregated into target, region, etc.
Secure survey system based on smart contract

rows.title: Solution
list1: SoTs installed at tourist spots recognize the level of satisfation indicated by users/visitors with showing their fingers as a data value
FingeRate 1.0 displays the aggregated data and analysis of the satisfication level accessed through SoTs
list2: Location-based survey (i.e., polling and satisfaction rating) solution
SOTs minted as NFTs / Participation in polling and satisfaction surveys based on a user's location

rows.title: Technology
list1: Face recognition and motion detection technology for reliable satisfaction data collection
list2: Automated profit distribution through NFTs and smart contracts

rows.title: Patent
list1: Offline satisfaction survey system through motion recognition
list2: Location based survey system on metaverse
Offline mileage payment system based on virtual currency

rows.title: Platform
list1: Location-based service technology, satisfaction analysis technology
